name: Bubble to Dream Shooter
description:
One of the coolest shooter games!

Bubble to Dream Shooter is a game with color Bubble in a different way. A game in the endless style and classic shoot-match-three.
The more color Bubble you get, the more points you get.
The goal in this game is to defend yourself against the attack of color Bubble.

*Features:

- A happy and colorful 3D environment

-Endless

-Ability to use 3 guns

- Ability to use scores of any color with bomb characteristics

- Challenge your friends over Game Center & be the
Bubble to Shooter Dream!

- Amazing graphics and animations and SFX

- Optimized iPhone and iPad
